text: Zai tiandi de chuangzao zhong, zai zhouye de jiaoti zhong, zai haili hangxing er youyi yu renlei de chuanbo zhong, an la cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shi kusi de dadi fusu, bing zai da dishang sanbu ge zhong dongwu, yiji fengxiang de zhuanbian he tiandi jian shuncong de yun, dui neng mingli de minzhong que you xuduo jixiang.
